_header: The life that lasteth little while
Subjects: sermons, verses in; transitoriness, of life
_description: Lines on the transitoriness of life, in a Latin sermon — two couplets

CULKk424.Transcription:
Þe lyfe þat lasteþ lytyl whyleþe dome þat
                    demyth wyt oute gyleþe payne þat ys frendelesþe blysse
                    þat ys endeles
